title: Sketch from the The "SCP Cheer Squad" Incident [EDITED]

Edit: I wasn't aware when posting this of the situation regarding Admin Bright, so thank you to those who made me aware. As a victim of CSA/Abuse myself, I definitely don't condone his actions, and I will be redoing this to feature my own character, Dr Lost, instead.  I apologise for not knowing about this.
 
[[=image https://i.ibb.co/Kmp2Gpd/2023-09-07-0et-Kleki.png]]

SCP's Pictured: 999 (The Tickle Monster), 049 (The Plague Doctor), 173 (The Peanut), 096 (The Shy Guy), 682 (The Hard To Kill Reptile), 529 (Josie The Half Cat), and my own character, Dr Lost <3
author: Dr Vikki Lost
